div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no formal legislation governing access to diplomatic records.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should consult the National Archives of the United Kingdom for records prior to 1981. For post-independence documents, researchers should write directly to the Antigua and Barbuda Foreign Ministry to request access.
